# CheckMate AI

[CheckMate AI](https://github.com/farhann-saleem/checkmate-ai) is a Free OpenSource AI Code Security Scanner with Human-in-the-Loop Feedback for detecting vulnerabilities in generated code.

## Key Features
*   **AI-Powered Scanning**: Detects vulnerabilities in code generated by LLMs.
*   **Human-in-the-Loop**: Allows users to provide feedback to improve detection accuracy.
*   **Dashboard**: Interactive dashboard for reviewing scan results and metrics.
*   **CLI Tool**: Easy-to-use command-line interface for scanning projects.

## Tech Stack
*   **Language**: Python
*   **Frameworks**: FastAPI, rich (CLI)
*   **Domain**: AI, Security, MLOps

## Links
*   **GitHub**: [farhann-saleem/checkmate-ai](https://github.com/farhann-saleem/checkmate-ai)
*   **PyPI**: [checkmate-ai](https://pypi.org/project/checkmate-ai/)
